name: RazorLove
tagline: Your source for customizable cryptocurrency templates.
body:
### What is this?
\<insert short description here>

### Available Templates
* **[Foocoin](/foocoin)**: The original template, Scrypt hashcash algorithm with Proof of Work, based on Litecoin
* **[ABCCoin](/abccoin)**: SHA256 hashcash with PoW, standard Bitcoin clone
* **[Fehcoin](/fehcoin)**: Scrypt hashcash with PoW/PoS (Proof of Stake), based on Litecoin and Peercoin
* **[Blehcoin](/blehcoin)**: SHA256 hashcash with PoW/PoS, should be based on Peercoin but seems to be based on Cosmoscoin. I'll need to figure that out.

## Incomplete Templates
* **[Tehcoin](/tehcoin)**: Multihash template based on Quark
* **[Fuhcoin](/fuhcoin)**: Prime chain PoW template based on Primecoin
* **[Modcoin](/modcoin)**: Yet to be released modular template.

### Authors and Contributors
***shakezula*** ([Blog](https://andarazoroflove.org/)|[BTCT](https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=101727)) was the original creator of these templates and used them in his altcoin creation service. He is taking a break from the cryptocurrency seem (at least on the active development end) and in the meantime ***Jack Fenderson*** (@catmanix) will be the core maintainer.

### Support or Contact
Contact details will be added later.
